xtsum: A function to create time-series cross-section summaries in R

xtsum.Rd

xtsum: A function to create time-series cross-section summaries in R

xtsum(formula, data)

Arguments

formula

A one sided formula; (key ~ .)
data

A tidyquant daily OHLC tibble.

Value

data.frame A data frame with between and within data

Examples

xtsum(symbol ~ ., data=FANG)

#>                O.mean         O.sd      O.min        O.max      O.SumSQ  O.N
#> open          382.696      283.983   22.99000 1.226802e+03 3.250852e+08 4032
#> high          386.380      285.849   23.09000 1.228882e+03 3.293708e+08 4032
#> low           378.665      281.805   22.67000 1.218602e+03 3.201169e+08 4032
#> close         382.644      283.859   22.90000 1.220172e+03 3.248023e+08 4032
#> volume   16489748.661 22355128.595 7900.00000 3.654579e+08 2.014499e+18 4032
#> adjusted      297.123      252.150   13.14429 8.443600e+02 2.562889e+08 4032

#> open          382.696      278.531 7.751772e+01 7.318607e+02       4    1008
